mapper.insert: insert into t_exam_arrange (id, examSubId, examDate, examTime, examClassroomId, examClrName, examSubName,examYear) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examSubId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examClassroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examClrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examSubName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{examYear,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, examSubId, examDate, examTime, examClassroomId, examClrName, examSubName,examYear from t_exam_arrange
